ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T02:25:11 [Issue ID 4000-1746790] urn:comicvine:4000-1746790 urn:grandcomicsdatabase:issue/1746790
ComicInfo.Summary:
Patton and Leah are ready to attack in Italy, but the Alps present many hidden dangers. The Americans are fully invested on two fronts now, with San Diego in ruins as well as the East Coast burning.
Available with Regular, Wraparound, War Crimes, Propaganda and Blitzkrieg covers by series artist Daniel Gete and a limited VIP Premium cover by Gabriel Andrade that is limited to 500 copies!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------|-----------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Daniel Gete | 1 | | WC | Wraparound Cover | Daniel Gete | 2 | | BC | Blitzkrieg Cover | Daniel Gete | 3 | | PPC | Propaganda Poster Cover | Daniel Gete | 4 | | WC | War Crimes Cover | Daniel Gete | 5 | | VIP | VIP Premium Cover, Limited to 500 | Gabriel Andrade | 6 |
